Description: Blue glazed composition amuletic figure of a ram; hole in the top of the head for the attachment of a headdress(now lost); pierced suspension ring on the back; damage to the front of the base.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.25
Bibliographic references: Shaw & Nicholson 1995 / British Museum Dictionary of Ancient Egypt (p249)
Condition: incomplete - headdress missing; damage to the front of the base
